title: Volantene Script released for free
content:
Volantene Script is now available for free on MyFonts:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/catharsis-fonts/volantene-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414190603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/catharsis-fonts/volantene-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/catharsis-fonts/volantene-script/")

And on Behance:

[http://www.behance.net/gallery/Volantene-Script/8787071](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414190603/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/Volantene-Script/8787071 "http://www.behance.net/gallery/Volantene-Script/8787071")

Enjoy!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414190603im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Vflag_5762.png)
author: Catharsis

comments.content:
Thanks for the gift. A very nice one indeed. I liked your Octant and Gryffensee fonts, but this one looks really special to me. It reminds me of the Insular Minuscule and Anglosaxon scripts of old, with a modern twist.

Good luck.
